full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DAM CAN NOR SGRUB KYI GTOR MCHOG DNGOS GRUB DBANG MDZOD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018B (CES DAM CAN NOR SGRUB KYI GTOR CHOG DNGOS GRUB DBANG MDZOD CES BYA BA 'DI NI, MTSO KHRI SHOG RGYAL 'GRAM DU 'KHOD PA'I BSTAN PA'I SBYIN DAG BE' LE ME 'GYUR RAB STAN RDO RJE SHOG NAS DAR HAN NANG SO DGE SLONG SKAL BZAING GIS RANG GI SDER GTOGS RNAMS KYI RIG BRGYUD KYI BSRUNG MA YIN PAS GTOR MCHOG CHA TSANG RGYAS PA ZHIG GOS ZHES NAN TAN DU BSKUL NGOR, DAM CAN NOR BDAG DU SGRUB TSUL MI 'DRA BA 'GA' ZHIG MCHES PA LAS, NOR SGRUB SNYING GI DUM BU'I LUGS LTAR MA, NGAG 'DON GYI CHOG RNAMS SPYANG YIGS NYIN BYIN CAN BYUNG NA SDIGS PA 'DI RIGS RGYUD 'KHRUS PA'I KHYAD CHES RAB BSAMS NAS BSRUNG MA 'DI LA MNGA' BRNYES PA'I RIG 'DZIN GON MA RNAMS KYI SA GSUNGS LA TSIG ZUR CUNG ZAD SGYUR DGOS RNAMS BCOS SHIG ,GSAR SPEL GANG 'OS KYIS BRGYAN TE, RIG PA 'DZIN PA'I @019A *, ,THA SHAL ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS SKYID TSAL YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL DU SBYAR BA'I, YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'PHEL GYIS BGYIS PA DZA YANTU, ,)
